original_text: They secretly did things that the Lord their God said were not right. In all their towns, they built altars to worship false gods. They built them everywhere, in small villages and in strong cities.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 자손이 점차로 불의를 행하여 그 하나님 여호와를 배역하여 모든 성읍에 망대로부터 견고한 성에 이르도록 산당을 세우고

sentences.original_text: that the Lord their God said were not right
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 주 하나님이 옳지 않다고 말씀하신 것들을

sentences.original_text: they built altars to worship false gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거짓 신들을 경배하기 위해 제단을 쌓았습니다
